info.name: PerformanceTrack API
info.description:
Complete API collection for PerformanceTrack Backend.

Run the Setup folder first to populate auth tokens, then run folders top-to-bottom for a full integration test.

item.name: Setup
item.description: Run this folder first. Logs in all 3 roles and saves JWT tokens to environment variables.

item.name: Users
item.description: User management endpoints. Most require ADMIN role.

item.name: Create User
item.description: Creates a new employee user. Saves the created user ID for subsequent requests.

item.name: Update User
item.description: Updates the previously created test user.

item.name: Get Team Members
item.description: Returns employees reporting to the manager. Uses manager auth.

item.name: Goals
item.description: Goal management with full lifecycle: create → approve → work → submit evidence → verify → complete.

item.name: Lifecycle
item.description: Basic CRUD operations for goals.

item.name: Create Goal
item.description: Creates a new goal as Employee. Saves goal ID for the full lifecycle flow.

item.name: Get All Goals
item.description: Returns paginated goals for the logged-in employee.

item.name: Update Goal
item.description: Updates a goal. Note: service may require the goal to be in CHANGES_REQUESTED state.

item.name: Delete Goal
item.description: Soft-deletes a goal. Uses seed goal 8 (Arjun's low-priority goal) to avoid breaking the lifecycle flow.

item.name: Approval
item.description: Manager approves or requests changes on employee goals.

item.name: Approve Goal
item.description: Manager approves the newly created goal. Moves status from PENDING to IN_PROGRESS.

item.name: Request Changes
item.description: Manager requests changes on a pending goal. Uses seed goal 4 (Arjun's pending goal).

item.name: Completion
item.description: Goal completion workflow: employee submits → manager approves/rejects.

item.name: Submit Completion
item.description: Employee submits completion evidence for the approved goal.

item.name: Approve Completion
item.description: Manager approves the goal completion.

item.name: Reject Completion
item.description: Manager rejects goal completion. Uses seed goal 5 (Rahul's goal pending completion approval).

item.name: Request Additional Evidence
item.description: Manager requests more evidence. Uses seed goal 6 (Anita's goal needing additional evidence).

item.name: Evidence
item.description: Evidence verification by manager.

item.name: Verify Evidence
item.description: Manager verifies the submitted evidence link. Uses seed goal 5 (has evidence submitted).

item.name: Progress
item.description: Track progress updates on goals.

item.name: Add Progress Update
item.description: Employee adds a progress note. Uses seed goal 2 (Anita's in-progress goal) with employee token override for Rahul's own goal.

item.name: Review Cycles
item.description: Review cycle management. GET endpoints accessible to all; create/update restricted to ADMIN.

item.name: Create Review Cycle
item.description: Admin creates a new review cycle. Saves the cycle ID.

item.name: Update Review Cycle
item.description: Admin updates the newly created cycle to ACTIVE status.

item.name: Performance Reviews
item.description: Self-assessment and manager review workflow.

item.name: Get Reviews by Cycle
item.description: Filter reviews by cycle ID. Uses seed cycle 2 (Q4 2025 - closed, has reviews).

item.name: Get Review by ID
item.description: Uses seed review 1 (Rahul's Q4 2025 completed review).

item.name: Submit Self-Assessment
item.description: Employee submits self-assessment for the active Q1 2026 cycle. Saves review ID.

item.name: Update Self-Assessment Draft
item.description: Employee updates their self-assessment before manager reviews it.

item.name: Submit Manager Review
item.description: Manager reviews and rates the employee's self-assessment. Uses seed review 2 (Anita's self-assessment completed).

body.raw:
{
  "mgrFb": "Anita has shown consistent improvement this quarter. Her work on the automated testing framework has been valuable to the team. Areas for growth include cross-team collaboration and presenting technical work to stakeholders.",
  "mgrRating": 4,
  "ratingJust": "Exceeded expectations on technical deliverables, met expectations on collaboration goals.",
  "compRec": "Recommend 8% salary adjustment based on market data and performance.",
  "nextGoals": "1. Lead a cross-team initiative 2. Present at engineering all-hands 3. Expand testing framework to cover E2E scenarios"
}

item.name: Acknowledge Review
item.description: Employee acknowledges a completed review. Uses seed review 1 (Rahul's completed review) — may already be acknowledged.

item.name: Feedback
item.description: Feedback for goals and reviews.

item.name: Get Feedback by Goal
item.description: Filter feedback for seed goal 1 (Rahul's completed goal).

item.name: Get Feedback by Review
item.description: Filter feedback for seed review 1.

item.name: Create Feedback for Goal
item.description: Creates feedback linked to a goal. Saves feedback ID.

item.name: Create Feedback for Review
item.description: Creates feedback linked to a performance review.

item.name: Notifications
item.description: User notification management.

item.name: Get Notifications
item.description: Returns paginated notifications for the logged-in user. Saves first notification ID.

item.name: Get Unread Notifications
item.description: Filter notifications by UNREAD status.

item.name: Mark Notification as Read
item.description: Marks a single notification as read using the ID captured from Get Notifications.

exec: pm.test('All notifications marked as read', function () {

item.name: Audit Logs
item.description: Audit log viewing and export. ADMIN only.

item.name: Get Audit Logs - Filtered by User
item.description: Filter audit logs for a specific user.

item.name: Get Audit Logs - Filtered by Action
item.description: Filter audit logs by action type.

item.name: Get Audit Logs - Filtered by Date Range
item.description: Filter audit logs within a date range.

item.name: Reports
item.description: Reporting and analytics. ADMIN and MANAGER access.

item.name: Get Report by ID
item.description: Uses seed report 1.

item.description: Password change and logout. Run these last since logout invalidates the session.
